---
category: news
title: "AI will 'lead to more games being made and more jobs'"
excerpt: "Artificial Intelligence will lead to more jobs in the video game industry, one of the bodies representing games developers has told the BBC. Dr Richard Wilson, boss of TIGA, says AI will \"reduce the cost of making games and speed up the process\". Video games have been using forms of artificial intelligence for decades."
